subject: Account Verification
content: Thank you for signing up for an account with us. To verify your e-mail address, you will need the five digit verification code included below.
Accidentally closed the page? Click here to return to the verification page..
Didn't sign up for account? You can safely delete this e-mail. Be sure not to provide the verification code above to anyone else.
This e-mail was sent automatically. Do not reply to this e-mail.
